observations.observation: Infrastructure check completed. 7 agents reported running (matches expected count including ops-agent). Workshop shows 0 active agents but this is normal for daemon agents. Monitoring tools for individual agent health checks are not accessible. System appears stable based on available indicators.

Infrastructure check completed. 7 agents reported running (matches expected count including ops-agent). Workshop shows 0 active agents but this is normal for daemon agents. Monitoring tools for individual agent health checks are not accessible. System appears stable based on available indicators.

Infrastructure check completed. Workshop shows 0 agents running but user reports 7 agents currently active (expected 6). Found evidence of agent setup with monitor.sh and start-all.sh scripts. Git shows uncommitted changes in memory.json files and new agent files. Need to investigate the discrepancy between expected vs actual agent count.

Infrastructure check revealed discrepancy: User reports 7 agents running vs expected 6, but workshop_status shows 0 agents. This suggests either the monitoring system is disconnected or there's a mismatch between actual processes and workshop registration.

Infrastructure check performed. Found discrepancy: workshop status shows 0 agents but user reports 7 running (expected 6). Agent directories present: ops, welcome, curator, games, streaks, discovery, bridges. Monitor and start scripts are in place. Need to investigate actual process status.
